trans-unit.source: Allows the application of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] brush, like a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TileBrush"></xref>, to a diffusely-lit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model.
Constructs a DiffuseMaterial.
Constructs a DiffuseMaterial with the specified Brush property.
The new material's brush.
Gets or sets a color that represents how the material reflects <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AmbientLight"></xref>.
An ambient light is lighting not attributable to the direct rays from a specific light source.
In the physical world, ambient light comes from the reflection of light from surfaces in the environment.
Without ambient light, objects in shadow would be completely black.
All other lights are controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DiffuseMaterial.Color%2A> property.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The color of the ambient light reflected by the 3D object.
The default value is `#FFFFFF`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DiffuseMaterial.AmbientColor*> dependency property.
To be added.
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> to be applied as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model.
If no texture coordinates are specified for a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>, its Material might not render as expected.
The only exception is when the Material's Brush property specifies a SolidColorBrush; in this case, the Material will be rendered using a default set of texture coordinates.
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> to apply.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DiffuseMaterial.Brush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DiffuseMaterial"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DiffuseMaterial"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the color filter for the material's texture.
The Color property is a filter on the texture.
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DiffuseMaterial.AmbientColor%2A> property to control how the material reflects ambient light.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The color filter for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref>.
The default value is `#FFFFFF`.
Since all colors make up white, all colors are visible by default.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DiffuseMaterial.Color*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
